The #BradwellB project is currently in Stage 4 of the GDA for the UK HPR1000 reactor.

urls.title: Time is running out: Government must “move on from aspirational words” and start “taking the hard decisions” - Committees - UK Parliament
urls.description: Government first set its ambition to improve the natural environment "within a generation" in 2011, but nine years on the Public Accounts Committee says "progress is disappointing" and that the complexity of environmental issues "is not a good enough excuse" for serious delays in tackling "critical environmental issues like air quality, water quality and wildlife loss" where the pace has been "painfully slow".

urls.title: Winter advice | CCW
urls.description: Freezing temperatures can cause damage to water pipes, both at home and in the wider water supply network. On this page, we’ve outlined the simple things we can all do to reduce the risk of pipes freezing or bursting, and the steps you can take to make sure you get the right support from your...

text: Winter is coming! Make sure you’re ready for the bad #weather heading our way this weekend. Head to our website for our tips on keeping your home winter-proof https://t.co/coPJE09ESl @EnvAgency https://t.co/qkB7MJq7hc

text:
@UTSurfaceMike His reply does 2 things.

1. Highlights that the @EnvAgency known perfectly well about the Court of Justice ruling and the words "Exceptional circumstances".

2. That he's still prepare to mislead the committee or has no idea of what's actually going on out there.

Neither is cle

@AnglianWater @mchapmanallen @BurnhamDeepdale @nationaltrust @EnvAgencyAnglia @AndrewDJamieson @WestNorfolkBC @AnglianWater spokes lady claims that this is 1 in 100 year issue, yet this same thing happened last year when we had series of storms in February, happens whenever there's heavy rain storm. In last few years this has happened on numerous occasions, so investment now is vital.

⚖ Court Result following close #partnership working between @AnglingTrust, @DCFishEA & @DC_Police. If you see illegal freshwater fishing in progress, report it to the @EnvAgency hotline on 0800 807060. Information can also be passed anonymously to @CrimestoppersUK on 0800 555111 https://t.co/oCAg24Aim7

Brian Matthews highlights existing DAFNI partners in academia, government and industry in today's roadshow with Cranfield University @EPSRC @NERCscience @SciComp_STFC  @STFC_Matters @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @bankofengland @beisgovuk @theCCCuk @OrdnanceSurvey https://t.co/NzzE4Nz77M

@CGNBradwellB @The_ONR @EnvAgency @BradwellBan Can we expect that in the second consultation documentation then? How is anyone supposed to evaluate the proposals if they're not yet fully formed and knock-on impacts on the region haven't been considered yet? This goes for the traffic strategy as well #LeaveBradwellBe
